sourcesContent:
<form>
    <select class="form-control" [(ngModel)]="selectedFoodtruck" name="foodtruck">
        <option *ngFor="let foodtruck of foodtrucks" [value]="foodtruck.id">{{ foodtruck.nom }}</option>
      </select>
</form>
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core';
import { FoodtruckService } from '../services/foodtruck/foodtruck.service';
import { tap } from 'rxjs/operators';
import { Router } from '@angular/router';

@Component({
  selector: 'app-accueil',
  templateUrl: './accueil.component.html',
  styleUrls: ['./accueil.component.css']
})
export class AccueilComponent implements OnInit {

  foodtrucks: any = [];
  selectedFoodtruck:any=null;

  constructor(private foodtruckService: FoodtruckService,private router: Router) { }

  ngOnInit(): void {
    this.loadFoodtrucks();
  }

  loadFoodtrucks(): void {
    this.foodtruckService.getAllFoodtrucks().subscribe({
      next: (foodtrucks) => {
        // Traitement en cas de succès
        this.foodtrucks = foodtrucks;
      },
      error: (error) => {
        // Traitement en cas d'erreur
        console.error('Error loading foodtrucks:', error);
      },
      
    });
  }
}
